After extracting the feature vectors for each superpixel using the PLSA model, the SVM algorithm is applied at the superpixel level to determine whether a superpixel belongs to the cloud or non-cloud class. This classification process helps in creating a cloud mask, which is then used in the subsequent step of the cloud detection method.
